Html:
Is there any reason that upgrading from 1.6.2 to 1.7.0 would almost double my file sizes, and is there anything I can do about that?

 

Thanks,

Bryan
This is strange. Are you generating xls or xlsx? Can you upload the two files somewhere so we can inspect? Or you can send to me: (erik at phpexcel dot net)

Thanks, I received your file and notice there is a problem. Posted in the issue tracker:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10746

I noticed that this was not addressed in 1.7.1, are there plans to remedy this?

Thanks,

BooeyOH
This is not forgotten. There have just been many issues to deal with. I hope we can fix it in the near future.
